wmndsAccordionProps.name: id
wmndsAccordionProps.description: Required. Must be unique. Used as an id in the HTML for the accordion as a whole, and also as a prefix for the ids of the section contents and the buttons that open them, so that those ids can be the target of aria-labelledby and aria-control attributes.

wmndsAccordionProps.name: headingText
wmndsAccordionProps.description: Text content for heading line. If headingHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsAccordionProps.name: summaryText
wmndsAccordionProps.description: Text content for summary line. If summaryHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsAccordionProps.name: isOpen
wmndsAccordionProps.description: If true, accordion element will be expanded.
